title: Venom - Novel Updates
author: 城崎
description:
For some reason, meeting with friends became tiring. Going to class is exhausting.

Something that’s supposed to be normal became a burden to me.

Anyone would be troubled if something so weird happens so suddenly, after all…

“Needy Girl Syndrome”, a supernatural phenomenon that affects girls who feel something missing from their lives.

I thought it was just some rumor, until it happened to us, who can’t find satisfaction from our lives.>
